sentences.cn: “ 日安, 老板娘, ” 新来的人说.

sentences.en: 'I know all, I know all,'said the last comer.
sentences.cn: “ 我全知道, 我全知道, ” 刚来的人说.

sentences.en: As soon as he saw Pen he descended from the window seat and saluted the new - comer.
sentences.cn: 他一瞥见潘,马上从窗座一跃而下,招乎这位新来的人.

sentences.en: Gondin sized the new comer up with a lengthy stare, thrust out a heavy jaw.
sentences.cn: 冈定长久地凝视这个来客,把他仔细打量了一番, 接着翘起沉重的下颚.

sentences.en: He rested his eyes on the new comer for an instant.
sentences.cn: 他瞧了一下那个新来的人.

sentences.en: He turned his gaze to the new comer.
sentences.cn: 他把目光移到新来的人身上.

sentences.en: In one comer were an osier suitcase and three bundles probably the three men's luggage.
sentences.cn: 那边的墙角有一只柳条箱,三个衣包,大概就是三位先生带来的.

sentences.en: She glanced at Tallis , who pointed to the comer.
sentences.cn: 她瞧了一眼塔利斯, 塔利斯指了指墙角.

sentences.en: Suddenly the new comer stopped with her hands on her key.
sentences.cn: 陌生人突然停住了,双手搭在琴键上.

sentences.en: The contest is open to all comers.
sentences.cn: 该项竞赛所有人都可参加。

sentences.en: The new comer applied his mind to the job.
sentences.cn: 新来的职员工作专心致志.

sentences.en: Then he walked to a dark comer of the veranda where he found his wife.
sentences.cn: 在那里,他遇见了他底被典的妻.

sentences.en: There was a great run to see the new comer.
sentences.cn: 许多人跑拢来看新来的人.

sentences.en: They made no stranger of the new comer.
sentences.cn: 他们亲热地对待那新来的人.

sentences.en: They seemed rather cool towards the new comer.
sentences.cn: 对这位新来的人,他们似乎很冷淡.

sentences.en: We visited the new comer without ceremony.
sentences.cn: 我们对新来者作了一次非正式的拜访.

words.tran_cn: 即将到来的；接着的；前途有望的
来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达

phrases.tran_cn: 全体来人；前来(申请参加…)的人

trans.tran_en: anyone who wants to take part in an activity, especially a sporting competition
